name: Joint C2 Rehearsal Blocks
description: ATO/ACO walk-throughs that keep Guardians synced with air, cyber, and maritime battle rhythms before execution.

cards.title: ATO Thread Mapping
cards.description: Trace every space effect supporting the current Air Tasking Order and capture timing dependencies with air assets.
bulletpoints: Identify space support requests by line
Record owning unit for each effect
cards.summaryText: ATO threads stay executable only when space injects are mapped and owned.

cards.title: ACO Link Validation
cards.description: Confirm airspace control order corridors align with current SATCOM pointing and JTIDS link roles.
bulletpoints: Crosswalk ACO geometry with link budgets
cards.summaryText: Airspace plans fail fast if link assignments lag; double-check them daily.

cards.title: Battle Rhythm Synchronization
cards.description: Align JFACC, JFMCC, and SPOC battle rhythms so the JSpOC floor never misses a decision brief.
cards.summaryText: Joint integration is mostly schedule disciplineâ€”treat it like any other comms plan.

cards.title: Fires Cell Fusion Rehearsal
cards.description: Practice injecting SDA updates and orbital windows into the joint fires battle drill under five minutes.
bulletpoints: Deliver updates in the fires format
cards.summaryText: Space effects help the fires cell only if they arrive in time and in language the cell trusts.

cards.title: Coalition Release Checklist
cards.description: Rehearse rapid releasability decisions for sharing ISR and SDA feeds with allied nodes.
cards.summaryText: Coalitions stay lethal when releasability is rehearsed, not improvised.

cards.title: Joint After-Action Capture
cards.description: Immediately log Guardian-specific lessons during joint rehearsals and publish them to the AOC knowledge base.
cards.summaryText: Joint partners reuse Guardian lessons only if you capture them while the drill is fresh.
